participants.name: Richard peart
participants.title: CEO / Director of operations at OO camp x free runnerz club

messages.message: There is nothing going on is correct.

I agree. This is a dangerous mindset to live with. I never knew growing up that having a soul means the ability to imagine the world you want to live in but being trapped by the inability to create it.
Communication is key. To everything especially infrastructure and good education. That I agree with completely.
You seem like a very smart man. Could you help me with these programs. Do you have any ideas ?
I have lots just want to see what you think.
More minds the better
Yeah, what does a typical program look like?
I looked at the site you sent, is that like a training camp + chance to meet important figures from the military?
Nothing typical. I decided to make learning fun with spy culture. James Bond kind of learning programs

Ok cool I think I understand now. I know that it isn't enough to advertise through one channel, you have to use every available channel. Like a GoFundMe and Kickstarter and Seedspot and Angel.co and FB and Twitter, etc.
I'm not showing off but I'm a unpopular Stan Lee to the public not big yet.
I'm telling the true story of James Bond for real
With the military and government ad you see on my site
Yes all that
Ian Fleming was a spy student of Camp x
The stories of X Men , Captain America, Gi Joe , Transformers and shield all come for the top secret story of Camp X which was a secret up until 2014
All the most popular movies and comic movies are tied to CampX . So right there I have the youth attention to the most popular things in the present
I've been working with Hasbro since 2012 to create special edition Camp x Gi Joe and Transformers toys , cartoon and movies
That's awesome. I did a bunch of research about a year ago. Have you heard of General Byrd?
No. Who's that
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_E._Byrd
Ok
I'm going to look
Started the secret base in the arctic that is now melting and could be revealed.
Also not known by general population until recent years.
Oh that's all the artic talk
I've heard about that place
Top secret
That's why just like camp x
Google Camp x
Amazing. Gives me chills just to think about.
What is your goal? Get more participants?
http://deanradin.com/evidence/Radin2012doubleslit.pdf

Walt Disney built and empire with just a mouse and called him mikey. I have a better brand and I can relate spy culture to everything. Big goal right now is teaching what camp x is that's why I teach it in Durham College Oshawa Ontario. Second is to finish the Camp x Spy museum plans that I have a fundraiser by selling Camp x fashion and about to start tours from Camp x to Toronto. Adding spy tourism to Canada
So what do you think
I'm doing all of this now , not an idea and not just talk .
Instagram @oocampxfrc @intrepidx13 @oo_campx_frc
I like it. I don't know anything about spy history so it would be nice if there was a solid foundation of entertainment that is historically accurate.
I'm doing it. Please keep in contact I'm a team player . Thanks for the uplifting conversation. Respect
Camp x spy tech and school training saved the world ww2
I'm letting the world know.
